documents.title: Act No. 42/2023: Official Valencian Paella Recipe
documents.description: Traditional recipe approved by the Parliament of Gastronomia.

documents.title: Bill: Reform of the Valencian Paella Recipe
documents.description: Proposal by Rep. Madrid to democratize the recipe.

documents.title: Bill: Sushi Rice Quality Standards
documents.description: Proposal by Sen. Tokio to regulate sushi rice quality.

documents.title: Amendment: Inclusion of Brown Rice
documents.description: Proposal by Rep. Naturist to allow brown rice.

documents.title: Amendment: Optional Socarrat
documents.description: Proposal by Rep. Modern to make the socarrat optional.

documents.title: Citation: Camara Plenary Session on Paella Reform
documents.description: Call to the plenary session of the Camara debating the paella reform.

documents.title: Citation: Senado Plenary Session on Paella Reform
documents.description: Call to the Senado plenary session reviewing the paella reform.

documents.title: Citation: Upcoming Camara Session on Sushi Standards
documents.description: Call to the upcoming plenary session on sushi rice regulation.

documents.title: Camara Plenary: Debate on Paella Reform
documents.description: Plenary debate of June 15, 2024 in the Camara de Ingredientes.

documents.title: Senado Plenary: Review of Paella Reform
documents.description: Senado review of the Paella Reform on June 20, 2024.

documents.title: Communication: Committee Report to Camara Plenary
documents.description: Transmission of the gastronomy committee report to the Camara plenary.

documents.title: Communication: Camara to Senado (Bill Transmission)
documents.description: Transmission of the approved bill from Camara to Senado.

documents.title: Communication: Senado to Executive (Promulgation)
documents.description: Transmission of the approved bill for promulgation.

documents.title: Written Question: Saffron Budget Spending
documents.description: Question to the Ministry of Gastronomy about saffron procurement.

documents.title: Written Question: Rice Import Standards
documents.description: Question to the Ministry of Commerce about japonica rice imports.

documents.title: Judgment 127/2024: Challenge against Paella Reform
documents.description: Ruling of the Supreme Gastronomic Court.

documents.title: Official Gazette of Gastronomia No. 2024-37
documents.description: Official publication of the reform and judgment.
